scripts.build:windows: npm run build && tauri build --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc
scripts.build:linux: npm run build && tauri build --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
scripts.build:macos: npm run build && tauri build --target x86_64-apple-darwin
scripts.build:macos-arm: npm run build && tauri build --target aarch64-apple-darwin
